```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

## Problem 1

**Read and clean the data in Mr. Trash Wheel sheet**
```{r}
mr_trashwheel_df = 
  read_excel(
    "./data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx", 
    sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel", 
    range = "A2:N408") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  filter(dumpster > 0) %>%
  mutate(sports_balls = as.integer(sports_balls))
```
